titleStmt.title: The proceedings against Sir Thomas Armstrong, in his Majesties Court of Kings-Bench, at Westminster, upon an outlawry for high-treason, &c. As also an account of what passed at his execution at Tyburn, the 20th. of June 1684. Together with the paper he delivered to the sheriffs of London, at the same time and place.
titleStmt.author: Armstrong, Thomas, Sir, 1624?-1684. defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
